body.name: SoftSheen-Carson Magic Razorless Shaving Cream for Men, Hair Removal Cream, Extra Strength for Coarse Beards, No Razor Needed Depilatory Cream Works in 4 Minutes for Coarse Hair, 6 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 33 mins
features: Razorless Cream Shave for Bald Heads: The best way to get rid of razor bumps is to get rid of the razor! Our depilatory cream features a light fresh scent, works in 4 minutes and lasts for 4 days.

For All Beard Types: This facial hair removal cream for men comes in 4 formulations: Regular Strength, Extra Strength, and Bald Head Maintenance, plus our classic powder formulation. No shaving with a razor!

Hair Removal For Men: We make an array of products for all beard types and shaved heads, including razorless depilatory creams and powders to prevent razor bumps, plus exfoliating cleansers and moisturizers
For Mens' Grooming Needs: From shaving to hair color, mens hair removal cream, pomade and hair moisturizer, find the products specifically formulated for black men that suit your grooming routine.
Softsheen-Carson: For over 110 years we have provided beauty to all consumers of African descent with our innovative, tailor-made, superior products and services specially designed for their needs.
body.description: Razorless cream shave formulated to help stop razor bumps and give a closer shave than a razor. With a light fresh scent. Works in 4 minutes and lasts for 4 days. Extra Strength formula for coarse beards. • Reformulated with a light, fresh scent • The more you use Magic Shave the better it works • Lasts up to 4 days • We believe in beauty without compromise Before using Magic Cream Shave for the first time, the following test must be performed. Wait at least 36 hours after using a razor or depilatory product before doing this test. Apply cream to a quarter size area of the beard Wait 4 minutes before removing. Do not scrape. Rinse area thoroughly. After 24 hours, if there is no sign of irritation or redness follow directions on product. IMPORTANT: Contains Thioglycolate. If skin is inflamed or has abrasions, sores or pustules, consult a dermatologist before use. Conduct sensitivity test before use. Wait 36 hours after using any razor or shaving powder. Do not use with any after shave product containing alcohol. Only for removal of facial hair. This is a safety summary. Read all product labeling and instructions completely.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Magic Shave since 1901 The best way to get rid of razor bumps is to get rid of the razor. With Magic Shave, the grooming expert for African American Men (since 1901). No shaving with a razor. Magic Shave is not a shave cream but a razor-less shaving system.

Magic Shave Creams The New and Improved Magic Shave with Light Fresh Scent available in Extra Strength, Regular Strength and Bald Head. Works in 4 minutes and Lasts for 4 Days. No shaving with a razor. No water necessary just apply.

Magic Shave Powders The original Magic Shave powder available in Extra Strength, Regular Strength, Fragrant and Skin Conditioning formulated for black men . No shaving with a razor. Just mix with water and apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly worth it
reviews.reviewText: I was a little hesitant to purchase due to some of the more negative reviews, but this product is incredible!Two weeks ago I used it on my arms, and I really wish I had taken before and after photos because my hair is growing back thinner and lighter than usual?! The regrowth started almost immediately after the 24 hour mark, but the process has been slower than if I would have shaved…It was also delivered a week early, and in perfect condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the stuff!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this stuff and it works great for me. Now i will state that i use this strictly for my genital region. I have been using it for several years now with very limited problems. Occasionally i get red bumps( kinda like razor burn for a day or 2 afterwords but it clears up with no problems other than a little itchiness) Apparently i do not have sensitive skin because i leave it on longer than recommended time.These are my instructions for doing the genital area ( booty hole, testes/shaft, and bikini area)IF YOU HAVE SENSITIVE WORK UP TO WHERE IM AT.1. trim hair to where its about a 1/4 inch or shorter in desired area that you're shaving. (electric clippers work great for this)2. apply a liberal amount of the Magic Shaving Cream to the desired area. I recommend starting with the bikini area, then do testes/shaft, then taint area, then booty-hole and cheeks.3. Immediately start the timer for 8 minutes ( or less if you are working up to it)4. At the 4 minute mark, Re-smear the applied cream around, just to move it around and get different angles on the hair. ( sometimes i'll notice i didnt get an area well and i'll move some from a more heavily applied area to the less applied area.)5. When the timer goes off jump in the shower and take a wash rag and remove the cream immediately. (you'll notice large amount of hair being removed with the cream)6. After your shower dry off and use your towel to help wipe off some of the extra hairs that remained. (you wont get all of them but they will fall off within the day so dont worry about it)7. Admire yourself in the mirror ( you good looking dawg you)NOTES - if you notice that around the booty-hole area is sensitive right after doing this process apply a small amount of Vix vapor rub ( yes im serious) and it'll cool down the area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works and EASIER than Shaving my Chest for Swimming! Check out my results!
reviews.reviewText: Definitely like this cream and no real complaints. I did a test area and didn't have any problems at all. I applied the shave and hair removal cream to my chest and left on 5 minutes and removed in the shower. Hair just feel of easily when I used a wash cloth. This photo is 3 weeks AFTER I used the shaving cream for my Master's men's swimming competition. I never enjoyed shaving my chest so this is definitely quicker and easier, although not as super close as a razor blade shave. Smells minty and didn't bother me at all and I ordered another tube. I only used about 1/4th the tube contents to do my entire chest and abs. I ended up swimming a Little faster and hair still grows back in!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never going back to shaving!
reviews.reviewText: I always struggled with strawberry legs and razor bumps anytime I shaved, waxing was too expensive plus having to grow it out, and nair never got all the hair and smells PUTRID. This still stinks like burnt hair when it starts working, but the smell doesn’t linger long. Washing after with an unscented soap then paired with an unscented gentle moisturizer after and I swear my skin has never been smoother. I just bought my fourth bottle. For the price too? I don’t think I’ll ever go back to other hair removal methods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Literally just does not work.
reviews.reviewText: I followed the instructions to a “T”. When the proper amount of time was up (4 mins exactly). I only removed a small area to test the effectiveness of the product (as they suggest in the instructions.). After removing that test area i noticed no hair was removed. I then decided to take the liberty to allow the product to stay on my face longer than recommended (around 8 minutes). yet, even after that amount of time. I then fully removed the product to see there was still no hair removal anywhere. This is the second time I have tried their cream based products and they have failed. First time was the blue less intense version. There was no result, hence to why I thought trying the stronger version would work. For more context I did and do not have a beard, I had more of a kin to scruff.For more details the hair was long enough to be easily visible (rough looking) and to cause irritation on my skin, along with being able to easily be shaved. ( shaving just causes more irritation though.)I wanted a refund but unfortunately this seller does not offer that option. I wish I would have paid more attention to that detail before buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Get the powder
reviews.reviewText: The powder may be messy and sometimes hard to mix with water, but works so much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Rubbing on like shaving cream leave it on for about seven minutes, then wash it off with warm water and wipe it with a warm rag. Very good stuff would purchase again. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for leg hair
reviews.reviewText: My upper thighs have less of a coarse like hair. But shaving it causing ingrown hair. So I gave this a go and it works perfectly! Keeps hair away for about a week.. And my hair grows fast lol
Yo tengo problema con bello en la espalda, la verdad me funcionó muy bien, hay que dejar que el producto haga su trabajo y simplemente limpiar con un pañuelo.

my husband had a rly thick beard and he hates shaving so we put this stuff on. he said it smells kind of weird but didnt burn at all. the hairs just came away from his face in clumps and it was so satisfying. hes gona use this stuff instead of shaving. i want to try on my underarm hairs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am not a man, i do not have a beard however i do have thick coarse hair on my legs and am always on the hunt for a good depilatory cream,this did not disappoint!! It was honestly the best one, better than veet or woo woo creams u see advertised. To all ye fellow hairy ladies out there, give this a go!!!

J'utilise ce produit sous la forme de poudre depuis de nombreuses années je n'ai jamais été déçue mais c'est vrai que ce modèle est un peu particulier ils disent de le laisser poser juste 4 minutes moi si je laisse ce temps-là ça ne fait rien il faut absolument que je laisse au moins 10 à 15 minutes pour avoir l'effet de rasage parfait cela me dérange pas d'attendre ce temps-là car ma peau est déjà habitué aux produits en poudre mais je préfère quand même la version en poudre même si cela reste un très bon produit et surtout fini les boutons

reviews.reviewTitle: Can be a realistic alternative to razor.
reviews.reviewText: Gave a close and very smooth shave when kept for around 10mins with its cool mint feel on the skin. Even very long and coarse beard was removed easily even the one below chin and on throat. I believe it could be a realistic alternative to razor with shaving creams. I feel that using something to sooth and detox especially the face skin, could help reduce any reactions/side effects it might have.
